actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to further the purposes of the Wilderness Act by incorporating French Pete Creek and adjacent roadless lands in the Three Sisters Wilderness, Oregon.

summary.text: Provides, under the Wilderness Act, for the incoporating of French Pete Creek and adjacent roadless lands in the Three Sisters Wilderness, Oregon.

titles.title: A bill to further the purposes of the Wilderness Act by incorporating French Pete Creek and adjacent roadless lands in the Three Sisters Wilderness, Oregon.
